pr_title: [BEAM-4766] Migrate to use vendored protobuf for bytestring

timeline.message:
[BEAM-4766] Migrate to use vendored protobuf for bytestring

All existing usages were private to the class and this will reduce the size of the jar from ~6mbs to ~4.5mbs

timeline.bodyText: Where does this module get the vendored protobuf dependency?
timeline.author: suztomo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -69,7 +67,6 @@ dependencies {
   shadow library.java.vendored_bytebuddy_1_10_8
   shadow library.java.vendored_guava_26_0_jre
   compile library.java.antlr_runtime
-  compile library.java.protobuf_java

replies.bodyText: It is a transitive dependency of :model:pipeline. Will update to depend on explicitly.
replies.author: lukecwik
